casebody.data:
YANKTON SIOUX TRIBE v. THE UNITED STATES No. 332-C-2

[222 Ct. Cl. 421,

616 F. 2d 486]

On September 26, 1980, the court awarded attorneys’ fees to Wilkinson, Cragun & Barker, of $226,900.85 to be paid out of the final judgment of $2,269,088.50 entered by this court on June 27,1980.
